Package org.codehaus.cargo.container.configuration

Interface RuntimeConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configuration, Loggable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRuntimeConfiguration, AbstractWebLogicWlstRuntimeConfiguration, GlassFish3xRuntimeConfiguration, GlassFish4xRuntimeConfiguration, GlassFish5xRuntimeConfiguration, JBoss4xRuntimeConfiguration, JBoss5xRuntimeConfiguration, JBoss7xRuntimeConfiguration, JettyRuntimeConfiguration, Jonas4xRuntimeConfiguration, Jonas5xRuntimeConfiguration, PayaraRuntimeConfiguration, Tomcat10xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomcat4xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomcat5xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomcat6xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomcat7xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomcat8xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomcat9xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomee1xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomee7xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomee8xRuntimeConfiguration, Tomee9xRuntimeConfiguration, WebLogic103xRuntimeConfiguration, WebLogic121xRuntimeConfiguration, WebLogic122xRuntimeConfiguration, WebLogic14xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly10xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly11xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly12xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly13xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly14xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly15xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly16xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly17xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly18xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly19xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly20xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly21xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly22xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly8xRuntimeConfiguration, WildFly9xRuntimeConfiguration
    public interface RuntimeConfiguration
extends Configuration
    A runtime configuration represents a configuration for a container that is already started. The parameters that can be set/unset depend on the container's capability for changing parameters at runtime (for example most containers support using JMX for changing some parameters).

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.codehaus.cargo.container.configuration.Configuration

        getCapability, getProperties, getPropertyValue, getType, setProperty

      • Methods inherited from interface org.codehaus.cargo.util.log.Loggable

        getLogger, setLogger
